decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - Within 3 years of the implementation of this permission, the modular building hereby approved shall be removed from the site and the ground returned to its former condition

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (01, 02, P10 and P11 received on 13/04/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall be as specified in the application and shall match those used in the existing GP surgery building.

Condition : 5 - The extension hereby permitted shall be used for a GP surgery and health centre and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class  D1 of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).
Condition : 6 - The use hereby permitted for a GP surgery purposes (use calass D1) shall not be carried on outside the following times 8am - 6.30pm Monday to Friday and 8am - 9 pm on Thirsdays.

Condition : 7 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 8 - The use hereby permitted shall not be begun until details of the arrangements for storing of waste and recycled materials have been submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.  The arrangements for storing waste and recycled materials shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with any approval given and shall be completed before any part of the accommodation hereby permitted is occupied.

Condition : 9 - Prior to the commencement of work on site details of the covered and secure cycle parking facilities, providing a minimum of 10 spaces, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.
description: Temporary permission for the erection of single storey extension adjacent to car park, alterations to car park with provision of a cycle storage area and relocation of waste bins
